metadata.title: CVE-2019-19777 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: stb_image.h (aka the stb image loader) 2.23, as used in libsixel and other products, has a heap-based buffer over-read in stbi__load_main.

criterions.comment: libsixel package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.8.6-1').
